'''"Lost Between the Pages of a Book"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Lost Between the Pages of a Book" is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Birch Wood = 16
|Blue Dye = 4
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Birch Wood,Blue Dye,Red Dye
}}
